page.title: 06HOBBIES
page.content: People in Blackrod pursue many different hobbies. A lot of people enjoy{sport,}such as{ {karate,swimming,rounders,tennis, {skiing,netball,squash,rugby,football {and golf.}There is{Blackrod Cricket {Club }who play in the Bolton Association. There is a stable where horses may be hired. Other people like to make things:{ {pottery,knitting and embroidery. Some others collect things like {dolls,coins,stamps,thimbles and model {aircraft. A local firm sponsors a {racing {motor cycle }that enters various races including the {T.T.races}in the Isle of Man. {Brownies,Guides,Scouts,Cubs,Church {Youth groups and a Youth Club}are some activities available for young people in the village.
